re-examine all material police held on alleged illegal phone Keir Starmer , Director of Public Prosecutions, said the Crown Prosecution Service( CPS) would conduct a "comprehensive assessment" of evidence collected by detectives. The purpose of this assessment is to ascertain whether there is any material which could now form evidence in any future criminal prosecution relating to phone hacking, the CPS said in a statement.
